title: 820-00923 PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD Reading 3.3V Instead of 1.8V
message:
This board came with no power. Stuck at 5V. After inspection I discovered the 2 left USB-C ports keep resetting the charger. After some measurements I found that 
PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD is giving around 3V instead of expected 1.8V. I then replaced U3100 as it's the component that generates this voltage, but got same result. All other 3 controllers have correct 1.8V on their equivalent line. Any ideas on what could be causing this anomaly?

title: 820-00923 PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD Reading 3.3V Instead of 1.8V
message:
Check resistance between that LDO and any other 3V3 power rail around U3100.
Compare with another channel.
You may have leakage inside board.
